com.ui
Interface WindowProcessTemplateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractModalWindow, AbstractModelessWindow, AssocEditDialog, AssocSelectFrame, BIRtvDetailListDialog, BIRtvFrame, BITransferDetailListDialog, BITransferFrame, CommonRtvDetailListDialog, CommonRtvFrame, CommonTransferDetailListDialog, CommonTransferFrame, CommonTransferHeaderEditDialog, CountDetailEditDialog, CountsFrame, GenericDateInputDialog, GenericQtyInputDialog, IdtFrame, IdtModifyQtyInputDialog, IdtSkuFilterInputDialog, PriceAuditFrame, PriceChangeDetailEditDialog, PriceChangeFrame, ReportRequestFrame, ReportTextFinderFrame, ReportViewer, RtvQtySentDialog, SIRtvDetailListDialog, SIRtvFrame, SITransferDetailListDialog, SITransferFrame, SkuFinderDialog, TransferQtySentDialog, TransmitDaysBackInputDialog, UserLoginDialog
public interface WindowProcessTemplateListener

Interface for processing the data belonging to a Launch Pad UI.

This interface is most beneficial for UI's that requires the gathering and processing of data before disposing of the UI. For example, a dialog that accepts input from the user, and subsequently the input data is saved to a database.

Author:
rterrell

getInputData

java.lang.Object getInputData()
                              throws InvalidDataException
Implement this method for the purpose of gathering input information from a UI.

Returns:
an arbitrary object as the input data
Throws:
InvalidDataException

processData

java.lang.Object processData(java.lang.Object data)
                             throws LaunchPadException
Implement this method to process the data a UI contains.

Parameters:
data - an arbitrary object acting as the input data to be processed.
Returns:
an arbitary object representing the results of processing input data or null if there is nothing to be returned.
Throws:
LaunchPadException
